skills.name: LUMINOUS BITE
desc: • Deals 3 hits of true damage to a single target.
• Inflict Taunt on the target for 1 turn.
• Inflict Heal Block on the target for 2 turns.

skills.name: CELESTIAL HOWL
desc: • Remove Negative Effects from all allies.
• Grant HP Regen to all allies for 1 turn.
• 35% Chance to grant an Extra Turn to each ally.

skills.name: DOG STAR
desc: Remove a beneficial effect from a random enemy with a 25% chance to Blind all enemies for 2 turns when you take damage.
